name: Bright Room
description: The room is possessed by an overwhelmingly bright light. By squinting hard, you can just barely make out an eerily smooth room.

northeast.name: Exit 1
northeast.description: A passage exists, but you cannot tell in which direction, for you are nearly blinded by the light

southwest.name: Exit 2
southwest.description: Somewhere in your field of vision is a passage, but you are disoriented by the brightness and cannot tell in which direction it lies.

sunglasses.response:
[Bright Room]
Upon entering the room, a shockingly bright light strikes your eyes, forcing you to shut them tight. You simply cannot bear to open them.
